lines.text: [after X explains everything to Mega Man, Roll, and Dr. Light]
But there is still good and evil, if Vile gets those lightanium rods, evil might just win.
Time to give Mr. Mayor a "friendly" call.
I'm going to make paper dolls out of you!
Maybe you should have used full power Wily, then you wouldn't have missed us!
[repeated line]
Sizziling circuits!
For a minute I forgot myself! You're more twisted than a car wreck!
Hey! I'm doing my best to straight, and you STILL mistrust me? You think you're too good for your brother!
You've got it all wrong. I've always wanted a REAL brother relationship with you.
Y-You do?
[repeated line]
Plasma power!
Whatever turns yah on, Doc.
I wish you'd never been constructed!
And I hope you get melted in a waffle fryer!

[in Wily's accent]
I feel all mooshy und tingwy inside.
Cut the cards.
[Cut Man cuts the cards with his blade]
Hey!
You said to cut the cards.
It's a good thing Dr. Light built me stronger then Humpty-Dumpty.
Take your choice, Vile! You can come back in one piece or one pile of circuits! Doesn't matter to me.
The only thing that gives me cavities is dynamite.
I'm sorry to take the joy out of your joystick, Dr. Wily.
Mega Man, you're late.
Sorry to disappoint you robo-bro, did I win or lose?
Air Man, get the gate!
Don't order me around. I'll get the gate because I want to!
It's not fair, Dr. Wily! I was supposed to make the glacier, not Fan-Face!
I'm one of your biggest fans, Air Man! And here it is!
Ha ha ha! And I'm even a bigger fan of yours! Now, blow!

[about Mega Man]
I don't think he likes us.
Wily didn't give you a lot of brain power, did he?
I feel like I want to crush that little blue dweeb right now!
Hold onto your circuits, Guts Man! You'll get your chance.
Mega Man! Long time no see!
Bright Man!
That's me! Haha! And I'm here to light up your life - with 10,000 volts, that is!
I guess I know why they call you Bright Man. Retreating's the *brightest* thing you've done all day!
You are one smart Mega Man.
You made me that way.

[He has been spying on Mega Man]
Aw, what a touching father-son moment.
It's a shame to destroy such an interesting looking device... bwahahaha! But I just can't help myself!
Nobody destroys Mega Man but me!
Thanks, brother, but nobody's destroying Mega Man today!
Goodbye, Dr. Light. It's been miserable knowing you...
